response.original_title: Puževi pažljivo prelaze put 2: Marljivi mravi marširaju (Puževi pažljivo prelaze put nightcore Lenin remix)
response.overview: The video, titled "Mravi marksisti marljivo marširaju (Puževi pažljivo prelaze put nightcore Lenin remix)," humorously blends a slow-burn, arthouse approach with playful, "conceptual art" vibes. It features ants, likened to Marxist workers, marching with diligence—an ironic commentary on collective labor, set against a nightcore remix backdrop. The remix and slow, intentional pacing turn the mundane journey of ants into a symbolic crawl, invoking grand themes of struggle, endurance, and… possibly nonsense.
response.tagline: Posle pažljivih puževa, pretenduju Mravi. Mnogi misle malo o mravima. Međutim, možemo mi misliti, mogu mravi marširati. Mravlje malenkosti mile, misle, manifestuju. Marks! Mobilisani mračni mravi - milion mrtvih. Molim?
response.title: Snails Steadily Stroll the Street 2: Diligent Dirt-Dwellers Dash (Snails Steadily Stroll Lenin Nightcore Remix)
